name: OPP Group SPRL
goal: A business information service focused on providing EU policy and legislative developments.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: All files (both legislative and non-legislative) in energy, environment, climate change, trade, digital, transport, food & drink and finance policy. Provide research and information services in other policy areas on demand.
